title: Statue steps

properties.name: description
properties.value: Statue steps are an unused scenery object that were added in the RuneScape 2 beta. Originally, they could be found in Falador, and were a plinth upon which the statue of Saradomin stood. However, they were removed from Falador quite early on and have not been seen since. It is unknown when exactly they were removed, but it was definitely between 24 November and 21 December 2004.

Statue steps are an unused scenery object that were added in the RuneScape 2 beta. Originally, they could be found in Falador, and were a plinth upon which the statue of Saradomin stood. However, they were removed from Falador quite early on and have not been seen since. It is unknown when exactly they were removed, but it was definitely between 24 November and 21 December 2004.

The statue steps cannot be found anywhere else, and as a result have never been present in Old School RuneScape.

'''Statue steps''' are an unused scenery object that were added in the ''RuneScape 2'' beta. Originally, they could be found in [[Falador]], and were a plinth upon which the statue of Saradomin stood. However, they were removed from Falador quite early on and have not been seen since. It is unknown when exactly they were removed, but it was definitely between 24 November and 21 December 2004.

The statue steps cannot be found anywhere else, and as a result have never been present in ''Old School RuneScape''.
